role.argrole: entity arg0 causes to show true colors

example.parse: (IP (PP-MNR (P 透过) (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *PRO*)) (VP (BA 将) (IP-OBJ (NP-SBJ (NN 影片)) (VP (VCD (VV 还原) (VV 现形))))))) (PU ，) (NP-SBJ (PN 他)) (VP (VV 学会) (AS 了) (IP-Q-OBJ (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *PRO*)) (VP (ADVP-WH (AD 如何)) (VP (VP (VV 拍) (NP-OBJ (NN 卡通))) (PU 、) (VP (VV 画) (NP-OBJ (NN 卡通))))))))
